definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: One-person company exists in the practice of our country′ s Company Law .
sentences.chinese: 一人公司在我国《公司法》实践中大量存在。

sentences.english: Corporate lawyers often have a one-size-fits-all approach to deals.
sentences.chinese: 公司法律师经常以那种“万能钥匙”的方法处理项目。

sentences.english: The newly-enacted state Company Law also introduces the measure.
sentences.chinese: 我国新《公司法》亦引入了该项制度。

sentences.english: The second part is the existing system of company law to protect the interests of creditors assessment.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是现行公司法中保护债权人利益制度评析。

sentences.english: But the company legal person system is not sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 但是公司法人制度并非十分充分。

sentences.english: The corporation managerial structure is the internal, operational core of modern enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 公司法人治理结构是现代企业内部运行操作的核心。

sentences.english: This explaination will give some reference to the theory and practice of company act.
sentences.chinese: 对公司法的理论及实务均有一定参考价值。

sentences.english: Article83 The provisions of the Company Law shall apply with regard to the organizational setup of an insurance company.
sentences.chinese: 第八十三条保险公司的组织机构，适用公司法的规定。

sentences.english: Laws governing corporations are to be found in individual state's business corporation acts.
sentences.chinese: 规管公司的法律大都是建立在各个州的单行公司法上。

sentences.english: A Type I telecommunications enterprise shall be a company limited by shares incorporated pursuant to the Company Law.
sentences.chinese: 第一类电信事业以依公司法设立之股份有限公司为限。

sentences.english: The independence of corporation personality and the limited liability are two greatestsills in company.
sentences.chinese: 公司法人人格独立与有限责任是公司制度的两大基石。

definition: legal person/corporation/see also 自然人[zi4 ran2 ren2]
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
